definition: to eat one's own fruit (idiom); fig. suffering the consequences of one's own action/to reap what one has sown
self/oneself/from/since/naturally/surely
to eat/food/animal feed/eclipse
to feed (a person or animal)
his/her/its/their/that/such/it (refers to sth preceding it)
fruit/result/resolute/indeed/if really
variant of 果[guo3]/fruit

sentences.english: Therefore they shall eat the fruit of their own way, and shall be filled with their own devices.
sentences.chinese: 所以他们必要自食其果，饱尝独断独行的滋味。

sentences.english: If you behave so foolishly you must be ready to take the consequences.
sentences.chinese: 假如你这样瞎胡闹，就应该准备自食其果。

sentences.english: He learns that buck-passing acts as a boomerang.
sentences.chinese: 他知道，推诿责任往往会自食其果。

sentences.english: Well, Greene, our crackpot finally flipped his lid.
sentences.chinese: 格林，我们的这位疯子终于自食其果了。

sentences.english: The scheme rebounded on her in a way she had not expected.
sentences.chinese: 她未曾想到这计谋反倒使她自食其果。

sentences.english: That critical spirit has a way of boomeranging.
sentences.chinese: 那种批评的精神会使你自食其果。

sentences.english: His ill doings redounded upon himself.
sentences.chinese: 他干的种种坏事使他自食其果。

sentences.english: We are now having our comeppances us.
sentences.chinese: 现在我们只有自食其果。

sentences.english: So some bets on start-ups now will pay off.
sentences.chinese: 现在在刚起步的网络公司下赌注的人会自食其果。

sentences.english: Japan will reap as it has sown, if it continues to act recklessly.
sentences.chinese: 日方如继续恣意妄为，必将自食其果。

sentences.english: Because of anger, you are in blame and tommorrow you will pay the penalty.
sentences.chinese: 因为愤怒，你在责难中并将要自食其果。

definition: lit. to eat one's own bitter fruit (idiom)/fig. to suffer the consequences of one's own actions/to stew in one's own juice
see 自食惡果|自食恶果[zi4 shi2 e4 guo3]
to reap what one has sown (idiom)/to stew in one's own juice
to crush one's own foot while trying to maneuver a rock (to a cliff edge, to drop on one's enemy) (idiom)/hoisted by one's own petard
pinyin: ban1 qi3 shi2 tou5 za2 zi4 ji3 de5 jiao3

definition: persisting in evil brings about self-destruction (idiom)
pinyin: duo1 xing2 bu4 yi4 bi4 zi4 bi4

definition: to spin a cocoon around oneself (idiom); enmeshed in a trap of one's own devising/hoist by his own petard
to court disaster (idiom)/to dig one's own grave
evil consequence/retribution (in Buddhism)
to have only oneself to blame (idiom)/to bring trouble through one's own actions
to play with fire and get burnt (idiom); fig. to play with evil and suffer the consequences/to get one's fingers burnt
a clever person may become the victim of his own ingenuity (idiom); cleverness may overreach itself/too smart for one's own good
pinyin: cong1 ming2 fan3 bei4 cong1 ming2 wu4

definition: lit. to try to steal a chicken only to end up losing the rice used to lure it (idiom)/fig. to try to gain an advantage only to end up worse off/to go for wool and come back shorn
pinyin: tou1 ji1 bu4 cheng2 shi2 ba3 mi3

definition: to dig one's own grave
appropriate retribution (idiom)
disaster one brings on oneself/to be reponsible for something bad that happens to oneself/to have only oneself to blame
lit. bitter fruit/fig. painful consequence
